ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On that Day, the Occurrence will occur
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: On that Day will come what is to come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: on that Day shall that indubitable event come to pass;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day, the inevitable event will take place
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So that is the day when the forthcoming event will occur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then on that Day shall the Event occur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: On that day shall the great event come to pass,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then, on that day, the Terror shall come to pass,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then, on that day will the Event befall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: on that Day the Great Event will come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then on that Day shall happen the Event.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then, on that day, will the Imminent [Hour] befall
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: On that Day shall the (Great) Event come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then on that Day shall the (Great) Event befall,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: on that Day, the Event occurs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On that Day, the Event will come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:15] then, on that day, the [imminent] Event will come to pass, the Resurrection will take place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then, on that day) when the earth and the mountains are lifted up (will the Event befall) the Day of 688 Judgement will happen.
